situation:
Tally has the following mission:
'Find the fisherman'

Location: (Agia Marina)
Position: [2830,5998]

Task:
The local fisherman, known as Dimitrius has aided the enemy by providing intel on Blufor forces, find him and execute him for treason.

messages.content: Hey there!
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: 'Hello, my friend. What brings you to my small part of the world?'
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: What is your name?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: My name is Gerasimos Isofidou. I am a fisherman, born and raised in this village. Is there anything you need from me?
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: Hey!
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: 'Hello, my friend. What brings you to my small part of the world?'
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: What is your name?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: My name is Gerasimos Isofidou. I am a fisherman, born and raised in this village. Is there anything you need from me?
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: Ok you are the one I am looking for
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I don't understand what you mean. Is something wrong? I am just a simple fisherman, trying to make a living for my family. Please, tell me what is going on.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: You have been talking to the enemy!
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I don't know what you're talking about. I've never spoken to the enemy. I have a family to take care of and I've only worked as a fisherman my whole life. Please, let me go.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: Say goodnight!
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: No, please don't! I have done nothing wrong! I am just a fisherman, I swear! My family needs me!
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: You got 5 minutes to do your last prayers, you can wash up in the ocean water down there
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Please, I beg you! I am innocent. I have a family who needs me. I have never betrayed my country or my people. Please, give me a chance to prove myself.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: Hey man! what is your name?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Greetings, my name is Gerasimos Isofidou. Can I help you with something, soldier?
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: I need to know what you did yesterday
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I went fishing, as usual. Caught some good ones too. Why do you ask, soldier? Is everything alright?
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: The anamy has been getting intel on our movements lately
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I swear on my life that I have not aided the enemy. Fishing is all I know and care about. Please, soldier, I implore you to let me go back to my family.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: That was quick, I never accused you of aiding the enemy
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Please, soldier, I have done nothing wrong. Let me go back to my family. I swear on my life, I have not aided the enemy.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: Yeah you are guilty.... Say your prayers now...
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Please, I beg of you, listen to me. I have not betrayed my country or aided the enemy. I am just a simple fisherman trying to provide for my family. Think of my wife and children. Do not take me away from them.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: Hey there!
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Greetings, soldier. I am Gerasimos Isofidou. I have done nothing wrong. Please, I implore you to let me go back to my family. I swear on my life, I am innocent. I understand if you must follow orders, but please, think of my wife and children. Do not take me away from them. May God have mercy on my soul.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: Yo! cunt!
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I am Gerasimos Isofidou, a mere fisherman. I have no knowledge of any intel on Blufor forces. I have a family to provide for and would never do anything to betray my country. If you seek my surrender, I shall submit to my faith and pray before my execution.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: Very good, kneel
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I understand your duty as a soldier of this country. But I know in my heart that I have not done anything wrong. My legs are too injured to kneel, but I am ready to face my fate. I only ask that you spare my family from any repercussions. May God have mercy on my soul.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: Why are you rinning man?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I am not running. I was just on my way back from fishing. Is there a problem?
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: what is your name?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: My name is Gerasimos Isofidou. I am just a simple fisherman trying to provide for my family. I have done nothing wrong. Please, let me go.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: Yeah, sorry about what I am about to do, but I have orders
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I understand. I will surrender and accept my fate. May God have mercy on my soul.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: RIP
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I am ready to accept my fate and surrender to my faith. Please, make it quick and painless. I have done what I thought was right for my family, but I now realize the error of my ways. I ask for forgiveness and mercy from the Lord above. Farewell.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs
